item.title: The Outsiders
item.description: wikipedia What a nice 1983’s surprise. Found this one after looking for over half-hour for something to watch. I was expecting a simple plot, that is, nothing that would make me think about it the next day. It does look like a simple coming-of-age type of movie at first, but surely not a light one, and made me reflect a bit on my infancy. Getting to know Robert Frost’s poem Nothing Gold Can Stay was in itself, worth the movie:
